entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has come to work at Hogwarts. He is excited and squeals when talking about his job.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is another house-elf who, along with Dobby, was given a job by Professor Dumbledore at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is surprised to see Dobby and Winky at Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is a teacher at Hogwarts who has given jobs to Dobby and Winky.

relationships.description: Dobby squeals excitedly when talking to Harry, indicating a friendly interaction between the two characters.
Winky was given a job by Professor Dumbledore at Hogwarts, establishing an employment relationship between the two entities.
Dobby and Winky are both house-elves who work together at Hogwarts, making them colleagues.
